> <OLD - VICE GRIP & DINOBOT>

> There was a glancing of confusion from VICE GRIP over at HYDRAS' actions,
> but he stayed silent otherwise, as did DINOBOT as DINOBOT was more focused
> on watching CRYOTEK and SKY SHADOW.

<NEW>

Yes, who was this HYDRAS, and how was he different from the MEGATRON
or the GALVATRON that were melded into his spark? Yes, he was a
machine who's very size and power commanded respect. Not only that but
he had forged a group of predators . . . of PREDACONS seemingly out
the defeat that had been dealt them by the Maximals at the end of the
first Beast Wars. Was he still MEGATRON and GALVATRON or was he
something wholly different and how would this affect the future of the
Predacons? Only the future would say.

As the group made their way to the meeting room there was indeed an
open message link waiting for HYDRAS, although the signature was not
that of STRAIGHT SHOT and instead of looking for WASPINATOR it was
addressed properly to the current Predacon commander HYDRAS.

"We must talk." were the words that were waiting for HYDRAS as he
arrived. LEO PRIME's stern face appeared to look through the link and
see not only HYDRAS but those who were traveling with him, peering
into his very secrets.

Of course that was not the case, since HYDRAS would have to
acknowledge him first, and it would be up to him how much could be
seen.

(TAG)

Preston
